channel.title: What I learned today
channel.description: Recent content on What I learned today

item.title: How to configure multiple wifi networks on a RaspberryPi Zero W
item.description: If you install Raspian on a RaspberryPi Zero W one essential step is to setup Wifi. You save a configuration file called wpa_supplicant.conf on the boot-Partition. But how do you configure multiple networks in one step?

item.title: The easiest way to install NodeJS on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: The installation of NodeJs on a RaspberryPi can be accomplished on various ways. This article shows the easiest way to do it.

item.title: 'fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories' in git
item.description: This nasty error in git happens, when you try to merge wo repositories, that are not aware of the existence of the other repository. This means, these repositories have a mismatching commit history.

item.title: How to remove all Docker images at once
item.description: Somtimes it is necessary to remove all Docker images or containers on your machine. Here is how it goes. It’s pretty easy.
